channel.description: Recent content in Android Oauth Rest on My little software warehouse

item.title: PostMan (RingsTwice) Reloaded - Android rest and oauth make easy(er)
item.description: Android and RestMy PostManLib android library had a quite troubled genesis. Some infos can be found in this old post , but bear in mind that I only kept the skeleton of what I wrote at that time (which, by the way, was inspired by this talk). The api was (to be kind) a bit clunky, and I recently chose to rewrite / finish it. Apart from its clunkyness, one thing was missing:

Some infos can be found in this old post , but bear in mind that I only kept the skeleton of what I wrote at that time (which, by the way, was inspired by this talk). The api was (to be kind) a bit clunky, and I recently chose to rewrite / finish it. Apart from its clunkyness, one thing was missing:
